Package org.seed.core.api

Interface FunctionContext

All Known Subinterfaces:
CallbackFunctionContext, FormFunctionContext, JobContext, RestFunctionContext
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractFunctionContext, ValueObjectFunctionContext
public interface FunctionContext
FunctionContext is the base interface of all function contexts. It provides basic functionality for setting and reading context properties.
Author:
seed-master

    Description
    <T> T
    getProperty(String name)
    Returns the value of a context property with the given name or null if the property doesn't exist

  • Method Details

    • hasProperty

      boolean hasProperty(String name)
      Checks if there is a context property with the given name
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the context property
      Returns:
      true if there is a property with the given name

    • getProperty

      <T> T getProperty(String name)
      Returns the value of a context property with the given name or null if the property doesn't exist
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the context property
      Returns:
      the value of a context property with the given name or null if the property doesn't exist

    • setProperty

      void setProperty(String name, @Nullable Object value)
      Sets the value of a context property. By setting it to null, the property can be removed.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the context property
      value - the value of a context property. Can also be null

      Returns the success message or null if none
      Returns:
      the success message or null if none

      Parameters:
